captions.text:
Perhaps the Constitution envisions
certain one-size fits all solutions...

Booorrrring!  I hear a foghorn!
Boorrrrinnng!

Élegislature override
a gubernatorial veto...

Guboringital! I--I'm not feeling any...
romance between us right now.

You gotta do it like this:
Shawtayee! Ready, set, go!

This was a pretty remarkable week
on the gay marriage front.

-First of all, to have a state like Iowa
-Whatchoo tryna say about Iowa?

- Not the east coast state...
- East coast!

- Not the left coast state...
- Left coast!

In a decision written by
a republican appointee.
Shawty, now you soundin so fine!

Give me your number,
we can bump and grind.

Talkin about politics all night.
Leavin the club in the mornin light.

If we get carried away (mornin light...)
we might get gay-married today.

We just heard from
some of our viewers who
strongly support legalizing marijuana.
Shawtayee, 5 of those calls was from me.

Do you think we should
legalize pot alone or all drugs,
including heroin, cocaine, and meth?

My brain says no,
but my body says yes!

I'm an angry gorilla.
I heard you needed me.

(ooh oh ah ah) Now that Captain Richard Phillips
has been successfully rescued,

the president has decided to
step in front of the spotlight...

Ooh, I'm angry! You can't see it,
but my forehead's veiny.

And even take some credit
for authorizing the mission.
Well, don't you worry, baby boo.

You'll always have an
angry gorilla to be angry with you.

That's what I do.
Just ask Donkey Kong. He's in my crew.

At the North Pole, new satellite photos
show arctic ice is melting so fast.
Oh snap, how fast?

Many scientists now predict
it will be gone within 30 years.

Surely you jest!
I'm under cardiac arrest, shawtayee!

Some researchers think it could
disappear in just six... (Shit!)

Without it there could be
a snowball effect. (Ohhhh)
With temperatures rising even faster,

if we all don't take
bold action and take it soon, (Yeah)

We will find ourselves on very thin ice.
(Very thin ice)

Very thin ice.
Very thin ice.

Tell em, Hillary,
pirates on very thin ice.

These pirates are criminals.
They are armed gangs on the sea.
That means the ocean

The United States
does not make concessions.
Or ransom payments to pirates.

Embarrassing...
Sorry guys.

Uh, sorry.
Uh... I gotta take this.

Hello, shawtayee, we can
meet up at the mall. (At the mall!)

Browse around at the bookstore,
mentally ball until we fall.
Love you too, grandma.

Ah... sorry. Any other questions...?
Anybody you wanna buy drugs? From me?

Auto-Tune the News (auto-tune the news)
Auto-Tune the News (auto-tune the news)
Everything sounds better auto-tuned.

title: Auto-Tune the News #2: pirates. drugs. gay marriage.

dying more than any of the illegal drugs and that would still be the case 
if those drugs were legal.﻿

comments.author: Michael Lowe

comments.text:
Why the fuck are these human puppets still exist in my reality? That was 
evil. You are not bodies and drugs were never illegal. You have no control 
over anyone. You don't judge. You can't measure time and pain. Only the 
ones who suffer and know that all news is fake. And also know every dark 
secret that these greedy perverted scrum bags have been up to. Now the 
wicked will be so humiliated their whole life, and won't ever get out of 
the matrix. You are stuck in a never ending realm. You had a choice. God is 
love. Like I said, you evil puppets are going to burn in the lake of fire. 
You created it. You messed with your own creator. You can't fool 
god.Everything is corrupted. Greedy scrum bags. Ha! There are only a 
hundred thousand Angels in the world. The rest of you 6 billion are fake. 
You are just fucking shit, and I am the one with the crown. You tried to 
drag me down to your hell. And that caused everything to change, it is 
impossible to create universes that don't involve god. Because all the 
elite can't let go of the material world. All you care is how much money 
you have. What kind of car you drive, and your junkie money pit homes you 
live in. So you can just fucking stay where you are and rot. You created 
human robots that have tried to steal information from me. They abuse me 
and all the ways that you sickos create. You set me up by trying to put me 
in a mental hospital. You create drugs that are okay to have if a doctor 
perceived it. You fucking hypocrites. You will never catch up to me again. 
I am ahead of you in light years. So now you are out of order, and it has 
been heaven's new world order since 2000. I put a stop to what was to come. 
And you dumb fucks can't get away with anything that is not for god. Only 
true angels can read minds. They have powers that will kick your ass in the 
grass. And there are all kinds of universes. There are heavenly realms that 
only Angels have the key to. All other beings that are not part of god are 
screwed. Just give it up already. I control all the humans that did not 
believe in their creator who is your savior. My enemy who knows all too, 
decided to give up on the scrum bags, and gave me his love and begged me 
for forgiveness. And he handed me over all of the wicked souls that 
worshipped Satan. Now you have nothing to fall back on. It is just an E 
ticket straight to the lake of fire. And I was saving so many lost souls. I 
saved them from going to the lake of fire. I had to go and pull them out of 
there. It was the most painful tormenting pain. I endured. I still can't 
fathom a place that these beings created. I went to all these hell realms. 
Hollywood movies are all true. They are doomed. How do you pay to sit and 
watch people being tortured? I went through that shit. And I am the only 
one that has the wisdom and knowledge. I have empathy. I feel everything 
that is painful. I feel all those emotions. I I suffer right along with the 
ones that suffer. If you keep messing with me and my angels. You will be 
obn the ride of your life. And you will suffer and maybe in a thousand 
years you will be on the same level me. ﻿
comments.author: Nicole Turner

comments.text:
You say you have empathy but then you tell everyone that's reading their 
comment that they're going to hell like a person that doesn't give a sh*t 
about what effect his actions have on other people. Are you some sort of 
hardcore christian or what? You sound like you might be insane. Either that 
or you somehow know more about reality than the vast majority of the 
population but somehow I doubt that. You could also be trolling. Most 
people are horrible I'll give you that but not all 6 billion. I'm sure 
there was probably 1 or 2 nice people that read that comment and now think 
they're going to a place they don't deserve. How do you know all those 
people are going to hell? What proof do you have of this? And what's this 
about angels that read minds? Have you met people that have proven their 
ability to read your mind because I doubt you have. I've done more nice 
things for people than I have mean things despite most people not giving a 
sh*t about me and despite the horrible things people have done to me, why 
would I go to hell despite that?
